title: Available commands
description: Hi I'm Purrito the greatest companion, that you'll want to bring on any adventure! Here are the things I can help you with....

fields.name: +dice
fields.value: rolls a specified amount of dice, use +dice help to find out more!

fields.name: +generate
fields.value: create something out of nothing, ðŸ˜² use +generate help to find out more!

fields.name: +describe
fields.value:
search for a D&D monster and find out a little bit more about them
 try +describe goblin and find out more about your favourite D&D bad guy

fields.name: +xpbudget
fields.value:
find out the XP budgets for a D&D5e character of a certain level. 
you can also find out what an easy, medium, hard and deadly encounter would be.
 try +xpbudget 7 easy for example to see what an easy encounter for a level 7 would in terms of XP
